message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal of money.
I understand you wanting a larger share Alice, but this split is fairer.  Let's wrap this up.
Bob, time is running out and the value decreases with each round. This offer is a good compromise. Take it or leave it.
Alice, I'm being very reasonable. This is more than fair for both of us.  Let's not let greed get in the way of a good deal.
Bob, I'm offering you a deal you can't refuse considering the circumstances. The clock is ticking, don't let this opportunity slip away.
Alice, this is my final offer. It's a reasonable split considering the time pressure and inflation. If you refuse, we're both walking away with nothing. Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a larger share than last time to get this done. Don't be foolish, accept this offer!
